createdRequests.title: Add tags for solutions

createdRequests.description: It would help people with light sensitivities and who prefer dark mode.

createdRequests.description: Challenge-specific Q&A would make for easy reference.

createdRequests.title: Preview images not loading
createdRequests.description: Challenge preview images are missing when you apply a filter.

createdRequests.title: More comprehensive reports
createdRequests.description: It would be great to see a more detailed breakdown of solutions.

createdRequests.title: Learning paths
createdRequests.description: Sequenced projects for different goals to help people improve.

createdRequests.title: Bookmark challenges
createdRequests.description: Be able to bookmark challenges to take later on.
